oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from James B. Owen to Sarah Bell
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Four-page letter from Pvt. James B. Owen, Co. D, 31st Ill. Inf. Regt., USA to Sarah Bell. He writes that he has no news but hopes her health improves. He addresses a rumor she heard that he had hurt his hand.; He says he did hurt his hand with his gun but he it has now healed. He says "there's no danger here if a man will take care of him self." Owen was from Brownsville, Ill. and died Sept. 3, 1863.
